title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 107 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 107 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢耶和华，因他本为善。他的慈爱，永远长存。

lineList.en: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;
lineList.cn: 愿耶和华的赎民说这话，就是他从敌人手中所救赎的，

lineList.en: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.
lineList.cn: 从各地，从东从西，从南从北，所招聚来的。

lineList.en: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.
lineList.cn: 他们在旷野荒地漂流，寻不见可住的城邑。

lineList.en: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.
lineList.cn: 又饥又渴，心里发昏。

lineList.en: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.
lineList.cn: 于是，他们在苦难中哀求耶和华，他从他们的祸患中搭救他们。

lineList.en: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.
lineList.cn: 又领他们行走直路，使他们往可居住的城邑。

lineList.en: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
lineList.cn: 但愿人因耶和华的慈爱和他向人所行的奇事都称赞他。

lineList.en: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.
lineList.cn: 因他使心里渴慕的人，得以知足，使心里饥饿的人，得饱美物。

lineList.en: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron;
lineList.cn: 那些坐在黑暗中死荫里的人，被困苦和铁链捆锁，

lineList.en: Because they rebelled against the words of God, and contemned the counsel of the most High:
lineList.cn: 是因他们违背神的话语，藐视至高者的旨意。

lineList.en: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour; they fell down, and there was none to help.
lineList.cn: 所以，他用劳苦治服他们的心。他们仆倒，无人扶助。

lineList.en: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.
lineList.cn: 于是，他们在苦难中哀求耶和华，他从他们的祸患中拯救他们。

lineList.en: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their bands in sunder.
lineList.cn: 他从黑暗中，和死荫里，领他们出来，折断他们的绑索。

lineList.en: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
lineList.cn: 但愿人因耶和华的慈爱，和他向人所行的奇事都称赞他。

lineList.en: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.
lineList.cn: 因为他打破了铜门，砍断了铁闩。

lineList.en: Fools because of their transgression, and because of their iniquities, are afflicted.
lineList.cn: 愚妄人因自己的过犯，和自己的罪孽便受苦楚。

lineList.en: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat; and they draw near unto the gates of death.
lineList.cn: 他们心里厌恶各样的食物，就临近死门。

lineList.en: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saveth them out of their distresses.
lineList.cn: 于是，他们在苦难中哀求耶和华，他从他们的祸患中拯救他们。

lineList.en: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
lineList.cn: 他发命医治他们，救他们脱离死亡。

lineList.en: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
lineList.cn: 但愿人因耶和华的慈爱，和他向人所行的奇事都称赞他。

lineList.en: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.
lineList.cn: 愿他们以感谢为祭献给他，欢呼述说他的作为。

lineList.en: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;
lineList.cn: 在海上坐船，在大水中经理事务的。

lineList.en: These see the works of the LORD, and his wonders in the deep.
lineList.cn: 他们看见耶和华的作为，并他在深水中的奇事。

lineList.en: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.
lineList.cn: 因他一吩咐，狂风就起来，海中的波浪也扬起。

lineList.en: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.
lineList.cn: 他们上到天空，下到海底，他们的心因患难便消化。

lineList.en: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wit's end.
lineList.cn: 他们摇摇幌幌。东倒西歪，好像醉酒的人。他们的智慧无法可施。

lineList.en: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.
lineList.cn: 于是，他们在苦难中哀求耶和华，他从他们的祸患中领出他们来。

lineList.en: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.
lineList.cn: 他使狂风止息，波浪就平静。

lineList.en: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.
lineList.cn: 风息浪静，他们便欢喜。他就引他们到所愿去的海口。

lineList.en: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
lineList.cn: 但愿人因耶和华的慈爱，和他向人所行的奇事都称赞他。

lineList.en: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
lineList.cn: 愿他们在民的会中尊崇他，在长老的位上赞美他。

lineList.en: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;
lineList.cn: 他使江河变为旷野，叫水泉变为乾渴之地。

lineList.en: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.
lineList.cn: 使肥地变为硷地。这都因其间居民的罪恶。

lineList.en: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
lineList.cn: 他使旷野变为水潭，叫旱地变为水泉。

lineList.en: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;
lineList.cn: 他使饥饿的人住在那里，好建造可住的城邑。

lineList.en: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.
lineList.cn: 又种田地，栽葡萄园，得享所出的土产。

lineList.en: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.
lineList.cn: 他又赐福给他们，叫他们生养众多。也不叫他们的牲畜减少。

lineList.en: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.
lineList.cn: 他们又因暴虐，患难，愁苦，就减少且卑下。

lineList.en: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness, where there is no way.
lineList.cn: 他使君王蒙羞被辱，使他们在荒废无路之地漂流。

lineList.en: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh him families like a flock.
lineList.cn: 他却将穷乏人安置在高处，脱离苦难，使他的家属多如羊群。

lineList.en: The righteous shall see it, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.
lineList.cn: 正直人看见，就欢喜。罪孽之辈，必塞口无言。

lineList.en: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 凡有智慧的，必在这些事上留心，也必思想耶和华的慈爱。
